iep_goals: Increase ability to remain on-task for 20-minute work periods in 4 out of 5 trials
Follow 3-step oral directions without prompts in 8 out of 10 opportunities

interviews.parent: Parent reports Ethan is energetic and curious, but has trouble focusing on independent tasks.
interviews.teacher: Ethan excels in group projects but struggles with sustained attention in lectures.

observations.psychologist: Displays average intellectual functioning with attention regulation challenges.
